name: Cyberpunk Character Creator / Metachar / Background generator
body: ### Welcome to the Cyberpunk Character Creator / Metachar / Background generator Pages. This is where you can find the source code written in Python 2.7.10 with PyQT4 for the various character creators for Cyberpunk v3. ### Dependencies for running the Python script directly * Python 2.7.10 * PyQt4 * xhtml2pdf ### Running the scripts manually The following command will start the character creator. * python char.py The following command will start the Character Background generator. * python bg_generate.py The following command will start the Meta character creator. * python meta_char.py ### Optional Binary Downloads for WinXP, and Win7 and above. * Download for Windows XP * Download for Windows 7 and Above ### Authors and Contributors The Cyberpunk Lore and stuff is not my trademark, I(@mcgillij) just wrote the character creator to make my life easier DM'ing games with the help of @mitchface. ### Support or Contact There is no support for this, use it as is or not at all, or hey modify the source it is up here as well.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
